title: BRIEF-Outotec Awarded Order In Australia Of About EUR 50 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Outotec Awarded Order In Australia Of About EUR 50 Mln

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 22:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Outotec Awarded Order In Australia Of About EUR 50 Mln Oct 18 (Reuters) - Outotec Oyj : * PRESS RELEASE OUTOTEC AWARDED A MAJOR GRINDING MILL ORDER IN AUSTRALIA * OUTOTEC AWARDED A MAJOR GRINDING MILL ORDER IN AUSTRALIA * ORDER VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY EUR 50 MILLION HAS BEEN BOOKED IN OUTOTEC'S 2019 Q4 ORDER INTAKE * DELIVERIES WILL TAKE PLACE IN 2020 AND 2021 * PROJECT WILL PRODUCE 22 MILLION TONNES PER ANNUM OF HIGH GRADE 67% IRON MAGNETITE CONCENTRATE PRODUCT

BRIEF-Outotec Awarded Order In Australia Of About EUR 50 Mln
